DOC.brief_summary: This study compare bioavailability Acetyl Salicylic Acid ( ASA ) Esomeprazole Aspirin multiple dose administration .
DOC.brief_title: A Healthy Female Male Volunteers Aspirin Study
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , open-label , randomize , two way crossover pharmacokinetic study compare bioavailability acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) 5 day repeat daily administration fix dose combination capsule ASA 81 mg/esomeprazole 20 mg ASA 80 mg ( European aspirin reference product ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 20 50 year inclusive . Have body body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 inclusive weigh 50.0 100.0 kg inclusive . Females must nonchildbearing potential childbearing potential negative serum hCG pregnancy test screen admission . History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put subject risk participation study . Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis result judge Investigator . History alcohol abuse excessive intake alcohol judge Investigator .
